room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: Dylan is very nice and helpful when it came to hints (even though we used only 1) we escaped with 11 minutes left. Highly recommend if in town. Japanese haunt room is very fun. We scored 2060 and give Eureka a 10/10!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: All 6 of us had a great time playing The Haunting. The room was scary and the puzzles were challenging. As escape room enthusiasts, we can say Eureka and it's staff definitely won't disappoint. Roy was great as our host, and we will be coming back to try the other rooms very soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: My family did the wizards and spells room. We had a good time and escaped with 15 minutes remaining. Steven was a good moderator and did a great job.

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: Steven. Cool guy. Cool rooms. Great time. Much fun. Very escapely.

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: The room wasnt bad at all. Our group was able to navigate pretty well. The only problem was our guy, Steven, who overslept our appointment by 2 hours and had no idea what we were doing in our escape room. The 1 hint we asked for, he was completely unaware of what task we were on. When we finally managed to break out, we had to radio him that we he had done so. He was unaware that we had finished.The wizard room we did was pretty fun. We all enjoyed waving our wands around and looking for clues in the strange symbols and breaking locks. 9/10 would recommend with different host.

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: Our family went and did The Haunting room. We didn't get out, but we had a lot of fun trying to work out the clues. Our guide Terrance was fun, friendly and helpful. It was challenging, you really need to work together, and pay a lot of attention to details, but try not to over think it! I would recommend it to anyone who wanted to get together to do something unique and fun with family or friends.

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: We did the Haunting Room last night, it was really fun! We made it out with 11 mins to spare. Can’t wait to do it again! I’ve heard the other rooms are great too!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: Had an awesome time in the Haunting! Terrance was great!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: Awesome!!!  Had a Great time!  The staff was Terrific.   Can't wait to Go Back!

room_title: Escape room "The Haunting" by Eureka Escape Games in Louisville
review: Went and did the Japanese thriller room and had an absolute blast.  Can't wait until the other rooms open.   We will definently be back.
